title: Kurukku Chiruththavale Lyrics Mudhalvan
stanzas:
Kurukku chiruththavale
enna kugumathil karaichavale
nenjil manja thaechi
kulikkayil enna konjam
poosu thaaye.
un kolusukkul maniyaaga
enna konjam maathu thaaye.(2)

oru kannil neer kasiya
udhattu vazhi usur kasiya
unnaala sila murai irakkavum
sila murai pirakkavum
aanathe

ada aththoda vizhundha ilai
andha aaththoda povathu pol
nenju unnoduthaan pinnoduthe
ada kaalam marandhu
kaattu maramum pookkiradhe

Kurukku chiruththavale
enna kugumathil karaichavale
nenjil manja thaechi
kulikkayil enna konjam
poosu thaaye.
un kolusukkul maniyaaga
enna konjam maathu thaaye

kodiya vittu kudhicha
malligaiye oru mozhi
sirichi pesadiye

vaayi maela vaayi vachchi
vaarthaigala urunjiputta
virala vachi aluthiya
klauthula koluthiya
vetpam innum pogala

adi unpola sivappu illa
kanu kaalkooda karuppu illa
nee theendum idam
thiththikkume baaki
udambum seiyya vendum
baakkiyame.

Kurukku chiruththavale
enna kugumathil karaichavale
nenjil manja thaechi
kulikkayil enna konjam
poosu thaaye.
un kolusukkul maniyaaga
enna konjam maathu thaaye

oruthadava iluthu anaichapadi
uyir moochu niruthu kanmaniye.
un mudhuga tholachi veliyera
innum konjam irukku ennavave

mazhai adikkum siru paechu
veyil adikkum oru paarvai
udambu mannil pudhaiyira
varaiyil udan vara koodumo

uyir ennodu irukkayile
nee mannodu povathengae
ada unsevane naan illaiyaa
kolla vandha maranam kooda
kolambumaiyyaa.

poosu thaaye.
un kolusukkul maniyaaga

udhattu vazhi usur kasiya
unnaala sila murai irakkavum
sila murai pirakkavum

kaattu maramum pookkiradhe

kulikkayil unna konjam
poosuvenyaa.
un kolusukkul maniyaaga
enna konjam maathuvenya
